settingInfo.month: Month：1 to 12，Can also use abbreviation: 'Jan' for 'January'.
settingInfo.week: Day of Week：0 (Sunday) to 6 (Saturday), 7 is Sunday。Can also use abbreviation: 'Sun' for 'Sunday'。
settingInfo.star: Asterisk(*)：Means every timeframe. E.g. adding a asterisk in 'Month', this means every month.
settingInfo.slash: Forward Slash with Number(/n)：n is a number, meaning dividing the timeframe by desired interval. E.g. */5 means execute once every 5 minutes.

askHelper.chooseDataFrameToEnableSetting: Choose a data set to view question explanation
askHelper.title: Question Explanation
askHelper.category: Category type field, no quantity unit.
askHelper.numeric: Numeric-type field with a unit of quantity.
askHelper.datetime: Datetime type field, the data is date/time.
askHelper.boolean: Boolean field, no quantity unit, the data is 0/1.
askHelper.unique: Unique fields, the data will not be repeated.
askHelper.value: Value is the data of the field, not limited to quantity or other types.
askHelper.exampleDesc: Because Boolean and Unique questions are in the same category as Category, the following are all examples of Category.
